weddingParty.title: Wedding Party
weddingParty.intro: Meet the bridesmaids, groomsmen, and honored friends and family.

qa.title: Q + A
qa.intro: Answers to common questions about the day.

faqs.question: When do we need to RSVP by?
Is there a dress code?
faqs.answer: Weâ€™d love to see our family and friends dressed up for our big day!

faqs.question: Can I bring a guest/date?
faqs.answer: Due to limited space, we are only able to accommodate those guests formally invited on your wedding invitation. If you received a plus one, they will appear under your name when you RSVP. Thank you for understanding, and please feel free to reach out with any questions.

faqs.question: What time should I arrive?
faqs.answer: The ceremony will begin promptly at ..... Please arrive at least 15-30 minutes prior to ensure you have time to park and find a seat.

travel.title: Travel
travel.intro: Hotel blocks, airport info, and local tips.

gallery.uploadInfo: During the wedding day, this page will be a place for you to upload your own photos from the celebration so the couple can keep and enjoy them. Check back here on the big day for the upload option!

schedule.message: Schedule is still being finalized, come back again for more!
